Define Documentation

#define LIST_UPSERT_TEXT (   A,
  B,
  C 
)
Value:
do { \
            if(svc->A && svc->A->thisp && svc->A->thisp->B && strnlen(svc->A->thisp->B, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN) > 0) { \
                n = strnlen(svc->A->thisp->B, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN); \
                upk_db_upsert(dbh, table_id, svc, SQLITE_TEXT, stringify(B), svc->A->thisp->B, -1, stringify(A), C); \
                if(n > 0) { \
                    hash_buffer_len += n; \
                    hash_buffer = realloc(hash_buffer, hash_buffer_len); \
                    strncat(hash_buffer, svc->A->thisp->B, n); \
                } \
            } \
        } while(0)

Referenced by upk_db_upsert_options().

#define UPSERT_INT (   A,
  NMIN 
)
Value:
do { \
            if(svc->A != NMIN) { \
                upk_db_upsert(dbh, table_id, svc, SQLITE_INTEGER, stringify(A), &svc->A, 0, NULL, NULL); \
                n = snprintf(tmp_buffer, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN - 1, "%ld", (long int) svc->A); \
                if(n > 0) { \
                    hash_buffer_len += n;  \
                    hash_buffer = realloc(hash_buffer, hash_buffer_len); \
                    strncat(hash_buffer, tmp_buffer, n); \
                } \
            } \
        } while(0)

Referenced by upk_db_upsert_options().

#define UPSERT_TEXT (   A)
Value:
do { \
            if(svc->A && strnlen(svc->A, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN) > 0) { \
                n = strnlen(svc->A, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN); \
                upk_db_upsert(dbh, table_id, svc, SQLITE_TEXT, stringify(A), svc->A, -1, NULL, NULL); \
                hash_buffer_len += n; \
                hash_buffer = realloc(hash_buffer, hash_buffer_len); \
                strncat(hash_buffer, svc->A, n); \
            } \
        } while(0)

insert or update a list option.

******************************************************************************************************************

Parameters:
[in]dbhThe database handle.
[in]svcThe service description to insert.
[in]typeThe type to use for bind.
[in]optkeyThe name of the option to insert/update.
[in]optvalThe value to insert/update.
Returns:
true on success, false on failure.

Referenced by upk_db_upsert_options().

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum _buddy_cmnd buddy_cmnd_t

controller side of buddy protocol.

This is what controller sends to buddy

typedef struct _buddy_info buddy_info_t

information buddy returns.

typedef struct _upk_controller_config upk_controller_config_t

controller configuration.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _buddy_cmnd

controller side of buddy protocol.

This is what controller sends to buddy

Enumerator:
UPK_CTRL_NONE 

unset

UPK_CTRL_ACK 

controller received the last msg buddy sent it

UPK_CTRL_SHUTDOWN 

buddy shutdown

UPK_CTRL_STATUS_REQ 

report status to controller

UPK_CTRL_ACTION_START 
UPK_CTRL_ACTION_STOP 

run stop script, which should kill the monitored process

UPK_CTRL_ACTION_RELOAD 

run reload script, which could, for example, send SIGHUP

UPK_CTRL_ACTION_RUNONCE 

run a monitored process in a restarter... only once... ???

UPK_CTRL_CUSTOM_ACTION_00 

run user-defined action 00

UPK_CTRL_CUSTOM_ACTION_01 

run user-defined action 01

UPK_CTRL_CUSTOM_ACTION_02 

run user-defined action 02

UPK_CTRL_SIGNAL_32 
enum buddy_runstate_t

states for buddy

Enumerator:
BUDDY_UNKNOWN 
BUDDY_STOPPED 

the current state of the managed process is stopped

BUDDY_RUNNING 

the current state of the managed process is running

BUDDY_RANONCE 

the current state of the managed process was that it ran once

BUDDY_UNKNOWN 
BUDDY_STOPPED 
BUDDY_RUNNING 
BUDDY_RANONCE 
BUDDY_UNKNOWN 
BUDDY_STOPPED 
BUDDY_RUNNING

******************************************************************************************************************

Parameters:

[out]valueThe place to store the single value.
[in]sqlThe table to query.
[in]...Values to substitute via bind (terminate with (char *) NULL) - If there are 0 arguments, you must still include a (char *) NULL).
